resources.string: This app is developed by UiTM Perlis student for estimating zakat payment for gold keeping.
Copyright â’¸ 2022,The Zakat Gold Inc.All rights reserved
Zakat is required when a particular quantity of money, known as the nisab, is achieved or surpassed.
One of the five pillars of Islam is the payment of Zakat. It is a charitable donation that every adult, mentally competent, and financially capable Muslim can make to help people in need.

Zakat Gold is a mobile application that can be used to calculate gold that users keep on them. The objective of our application is to make it easier for users to calculate their zakat to pay for their gold. Our easy-to-use calculator will take the guesswork out of calculating your Zakat payment. You can easily determine how much you need to contribute if you have information on all of your assets.
